snippet: Andy Reid, the former Eagles coach, and the Chiefs have reportedly agreed to a deal giving him broad authority over football decisions.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Kansas City Chiefs reportedly reach agreement with former Philadelphia Eagles coach Andy Reid; addition of Reid could help stabilize team that was expected to contend for AFC West title but instead floundered; other football developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Andy Reid, the former Eagles coach, and the Chiefs have reportedly agreed to a deal giving him broad authority over football decisions.

headline.seo: Chiefs Have Sights on Reid, And Part Ways With Pioli
headline.main: Their Sights Set on Reid, Chiefs Part Ways With Pioli
headline.print_headline: Their Sights Set on Reid, Chiefs Part Ways With Pioli
